Package com.example.geoquizfrontend.models

Class GameData

java.lang.Object
com.example.geoquizfrontend.models.GameData
public class GameData extends Object
GameData is a class that represents game data for a country. It contains information about the country's name, capital, flag, coat of arms (coa), continent, and population.
